column5: We went out for musky opener on the bog not a bite all day.We did see a crappie,bluegill pumpkin seed and sucker all dead or dying on top of the water not sure what was up with that?We were fishing in a spot for over an hour with no success than a boat comes by trolling and they get a 43'' ski not even a hundred yards away.When we got back to the boat launch a guy pulls in a nice twenty something inch walleye than a carp.That was our day.
Dang sounds like you were fishing LSC casting for a long time nothing set up trolling and BANG.  Sounds like you had a nice day even if there was no slime for you.
